Update on Valley Road Paving Project.

Milling and Paving will begin Wednesday, September 27 at 7am. The construction will begin at Valley Road and River Road and move east, ending at Mountain Avenue.

Detours will be in place beginning September 27 which are as follows.

Day 1: Start on Valley Road at River Road traveling East towards Main Ave. The anticipated working hours will be 7:00am to 4:00pm and Eastbound traffic will remain open. A detour will be in place on Valley Road directing all Westbound traffic North onto Northfield Road, West onto Long Hill Road, South onto Division Avenue, West onto Stonehouse Road, South onto River Road and ending at Valley Road.

Days 2-3: 7:00am to 4:00pm working hours Near Northfield Road traveling East towards Main Avenue and Eastbound traffic will remain open. A detour will be in place at Main Avenue directing all traffic traveling West to turn North onto Main Avenue, West onto Long Hill Road, South onto Division Avenue to Valley Road.

Work scheduled for the week of October 2-6 will be posted next week along with proposed detours.

Darcy Carn
